Package net.rim.device.api.barcodelib

Interface Summary
BarcodeDecoderListener Listener used in conjunction with BarcodeScanner.
 

Class Summary
BarcodeBitmap A convenience class to create a Bitmap image from a supplied ByteMatrix.
BarcodeDecoder A barcode decoder class that recognizes 1D and 2D barcodes.
BarcodeScanner An ImageScanner intended for barcode scanning.
BarcodeScannerOverlayField Provides an overlay for the viewfinder when using a BarcodeDecoder.
BitmapLuminanceSource A BlackBerry specific implementation of LuminanceSource with support for BlackBerry Bitmaps.
PlanarYUVLuminanceSource Implementation of LuminanceSource with support for planarized YUV data (where the Y channel comes first).
